items.description: The `EXTPOS` is obsolete, it should be replaced by `ExtPos`
The `@fixed` is obsolete, it should be replaced by feature `InIdiom=Yes` on the dependent
The feature `PhraseType` is obsolete. `PhraseType=Idiom` should be replaced by `Idiom=Yes` and `PhraseType=Title` should be replaced by `Title=Yes`
The gov of `InIdiom` is not in a MWE
